title: My Brother’s Mistress Is My Girlfriend
itunes:title: My Brother’s Mistress Is My Girlfriend
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 42 year old single man and I have a good job and my own place. My brother is a married man with 3 children and many mistresses. He always brings his mistresses to gatherings with the boys and I told him that’s probably not a good idea because most of them are baaad and the boys try to holler at them. I talked to him many times about the cheating because he’s always using me as his alibi. Two months ago, I was out with my brother and one of his mistresses was there...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
